TopicTitle: Looking for some mods that may or may not exist

Articles.Content:
Was hoping for two pieces of functionality:

1. Disable the delete button in the tracking station. I know I could just not use it, but it would be cool if there was a way to disable it.

2. Automatic time unwarp before maneuver nodes. I know mechjeb does this for autopilot. Is there a mod out there that will do it for all maneuver nodes?

2. Automatic time unwarp before maneuver nodes. I know mechjeb does this for autopilot. Is there a mod out there that will do it for all maneuver nodes?

Kerbal Alarm Clock
I'm reading the info about it and I'm unsure of one thing. Do you know if you can have it automatically create one whenever you use a maneuver node? Or do you have to manually do it each time?
2 - Mechjeb have a "Warper helper" button that does that. Or use Kerbal Alarm Clock
